func_sig.description: Solves for the third side of a right triangle using the Pythagorean Theorem when two side lengths are provided.
func_sig.name: solve_pythagorean_theorem

a.description: The length of one side (not the hypotenuse) of the triangle.

b.description: The length of the other side (not the hypotenuse) of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its radius.
func_sig.name: volume_of_sphere

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
func_sig.name: evaluate_expression

func_sig.description: Calculate the volume of a sphere given its diameter or radius.
func_sig.name: calculate_spherical_volume

func_sig.description: Calculate the remaining leg of a right triangle given one leg and the hypotenuse using the Pythagorean theorem.
func_sig.name: calculate_right_triangle_leg

hypotenuse.description: The length of the hypotenuse of the triangle.

leg.description: The length of the known leg of the triangle.

func_sig.description: Calculates the volume and surface area of a cone given its height and radius.
func_sig.name: calculate_cone_properties

radius.description: The radius of the base of the cone.
